__e: All I wanted to say... was what I can think of no finer, fluffier, shiner people to see the New Year in with your good selves.
You need things to be soft, sensitive and above all, new.
Some of the songs are soft and slow, and there's always a guy who didn't bring a date... and wants to dance with your girl-- guys who don't take no for an answer.
Gold colour; maple, toffee and caramel aromas; sweet, rich maple syrup and toffee flavours
The moment he does... soft lights, romantic music,
Still the softest hands in all of Paris.
